Data Package Best Practices Environmental Data Initiative 2019-11-05 1 About this Site 1.1 Overview DRAFT - DRAFT - DRAFT This site is book written in Markdown, and transformed to HTML with the bookdown package The bookdown package can be installed from CRAN or Github: install.packages("bookdown") # or the development version # devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown") It is based on the sample from https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/bookdown-start.html 1.2 Guidelines and requirmements Each Rmd file contains one and only one chapter, and a chapter is defined by the first-level heading #. To compile the PDF, you need XeLaTeX. Install TinyTeX (which includes XeLaTeX): https://yihui.name/tinytex/. site is served from the docs directory as gh-pages. 1.3 Steps (details TBD) edit markdown review in master branch, e.g. by BP committee or other build book(s) - output sent to docs add-commit-push (docs) 1.4 Other stuff you might need. also notes. some to be dropped how to pandoc how to handle citations with bib how to handle the left menu within books index page does not have to be a book how to drop numbering! this: ## Metadata concept {-} or even this: # {-} it might be a hack. if so, advise on better way. the search function (in header) only works once files are on a server.
